Sequence Information.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from SARS-CoV spike protein)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.16616792]SARS-CoV:inhibition of plaque information on Vero E6 cells(90% inhibition at ~30 μM,IC50=2 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.16616792]No cytotoxicity against Vero E6 cells up to 30 μM.
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Inhibition of severe acute respiratory syndrome-associated coronavirus (SARS-CoV) infectivity by peptides analogous to the viral spike protein
Literature.Author: Sainz B Jr, Mossel EC, Gallaher WR, Wimley WC, Peters CJ, Wilson RB, Garry RF.
